customize.message_template: {{change_type}}{% if change_scope %}({{change_scope}}){% endif %}:{% if change_message %} {{change_message}}{% endif %}
customize.example: feature: this feature enable customize through config file

questions.name: change_type

choices.name: feature: A new feature. Correlates with MINOR in SemVer
fix: A bug fix. Correlates with PATCH in SemVer
style: A bug fix. Changes that do not affect the meaning of code (white-space, formatting, etc)
refactor: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
performance: A code change that improves performance
test: Adding missing or correcting existing tests
build: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: pip, docker, npm)
ci: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts
breaking change: Changes that impact use of software

questions.message: Select the type of change you are committing (Use arrow keys)

questions.name: change_scope
questions.message: What is the scope of this change? (class, file name, module): (press [enter] to skip)

questions.name: change_message
questions.message: Write a short and imperative summary of the code changes: (lower case and no period)
